variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: PARTICIPANT ID [Visit 9] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]

variable.name: VISIT
variable.description: CONTACT OCCASION [Visit 9] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]

variable.name: PDSB1A
variable.description: Q1a. Think of this ladder with ten steps as representing where people stand in their communities. At step 10 are people who have the highest standing in their community. At step 1 are people who have the lowest standing in their community. [Visit 9] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]

variable.name: PDSB2
variable.description: Q2. We would like to know about the kind of work you do. Which best describes your current work status? [Visit 9] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]
variable.value: Sick or on leave for health reasons
Homemaker, not working outside the ho

variable.name: PDSB3
variable.description: Q3. When was your last regular job for pay [Visit 9] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]

variable.name: PDSB4
variable.description: Q4. Are you currently working one or more jobs? [Visit 9] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]

variable.name: PDSB5B
variable.description: Q5b. Are/were you self - employed for this occupation [Visit 9] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]

variable.name: PDSB8A
variable.description: Q8a. How long (have you had/did you have) your main job? [Visit 9] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]

variable.name: PDSB8B
variable.description: Q8b. (Is/Was) your job one that (provides/provided) regular steady work [Visit 9] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]

variable.name: PDSB9A
variable.description: Q9a. Thinking over your entire work life, have you ever been unemployed [Visit 9] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]

variable.name: PDSB9B
variable.description: Q9b. How many times have you been unemployed for more than 6 months? [Visit 9] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]

variable.name: PDSB10
variable.description: Q10. How satisfied are you with your job? [Visit 9] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]

variable.name: PDSB12
variable.description: Q12. Pretend that the steps on this ladder stand for 10 possible steps in your life. At step 10 are people who have the highest standing in their community. At step 1 are people who have the lowest standing in their community. [Visit 9] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]

variable.name: PDSB13
variable.description: Q13. Would you please tell me the step number that best describes where you were ten years ago. At step 10 are people who have the highest standing in their community. At step 1 are people who have the lowest standing in their community. [Visit 9] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]

variable.name: PDSB14
variable.description: Q14. Will you please tell me the step number that best describes where you would like to be next year. At step 10 are people who have the highest standing in their community. At step 1 are people who have the lowest standing in their community. [Visit 9] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]

variable.name: PDSB15
variable.description: Q15. Will you please tell me the step number that best describes where you expect to next year? At step 10 are people who have the highest standing in their community. At step 1 are people who have the lowest standing in their community. [Visit 9] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]

variable.name: PDSB16
variable.description: Q16. How disappointed would you be if you found out that you could never reach [Visit 9] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]

variable.name: PDSB17A
variable.description: Q17a. What is the highest degree or years of school you have completed, including trade or vocational school or college [Visit 9] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]
variable.value: Some vocational or trade school, but no certificates
Graduate or professional schools (MA, MS, Master Doctorate, MD, JD, DDS, DVM)

variable.name: PDSB17B
variable.description: Q17b. Did you complete a GED? [Visit 9] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]

variable.name: PDSB18A
variable.description: Q18a. Have you completed any other training or education [Visit 9] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]

variable.name: PDSB19
variable.description: Q19. [DO NOT ASK; REFER TO SOCIAL SUPPORT FORM]. Have you had spouse or currently partner? [Visit 9] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]

variable.name: PDSB20
variable.description: Q20. Is your (husband/ wife/ partner)presently working for pay? [Visit 9] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]

variable.name: PDSB22A
variable.description: Q22a. What is the highest degree or years of school your (husband/ wife/ partner) ever completed, including trade or vocational school or college? [Visit 9] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]
variable.value: Some vocational or trade school, but no certificates
Graduate or professional schools (MA, MS, Master Doctorate, MD, JD, DDS, DVM)

variable.name: PDSB22B
variable.description: Q22b. [IF LESS THAN 12 ASK:] Did (he/she) complete a GED? [Visit 9] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]

variable.name: PDSB23
variable.description: Q23. Are you or your family renting, buying ( paying a mortgage), or do you own ( paid off) the house or apartment where you live now? [Visit 9] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]

variable.name: PDSB24
variable.description: Q24. Do you own or are buying/ leasing one or more cars? [Visit 9] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]

variable.name: PDSB25
variable.description: Q25. Suppose you needed money quickly and you cashed in all of your (and your spouse's/ partner's )checking and savings accounts, cars, jewelry or other possessions and nay stocks, bonds [Visit 9] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]

variable.name: PDSB26A
variable.description: Q26a. In the past year did you or anyone living in your household receive an income from the following source? Investments? [Visit 9] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]

variable.name: PDSB26B
variable.description: Q26b. In the past year did you or anyone living in your household receive an income from the following source? Social security? [Visit 9] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]

variable.name: PDSB26C
variable.description: Q26c. In the past year did you or anyone living in your household receive an income from the following source? Workers compensation? [Visit 9] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]

variable.name: PDSB26D
variable.description: Q26d. In the past year did you or anyone living in your household receive an income from the following source? Unemployment compensation? [Visit 9] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]

variable.name: PDSB26E
variable.description: Q26e. In the past year did you or anyone living in your household receive an income from the following source? ADC OR AFDC?(aid to dependent children) [Visit 9] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]

variable.name: PDSB26F
variable.description: Q26f. In the past year did you or anyone living in your household receive an income from the following source? Food stamps? [Visit 9] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]

variable.name: PDSB26G
variable.description: Q26g. In the past year did you or anyone living in your household receive an income from the following source? Other welfare programs? [Visit 9] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]

variable.name: PDSB26H
variable.description: Q26h. In the past year did you or anyone living in your household receive an income from the following source? Supplemental security income (SSI)? [Visit 9] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]

variable.name: PDSB26I
variable.description: Q26i. In the past year did you or anyone living in your household receive an income from the following source? Gambling? [Visit 9] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]

variable.name: PDSB27A
variable.description: Q27a. Now , thinking of all these sources as well as money from jobs, income from a business, or farm, rent from property, social security or retirement benefits. [Visit 9] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]

variable.name: PDSB27B
variable.description: Q27b. You may not be able to give me an exact range for your family income. Did your family received $35K or more? [Visit 9] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]

variable.name: PDSB27C

variable.name: PDSB27D

variable.name: PDSB27E
variable.description: Q27e. You may not be able to give me an exact range for your family income. Did your family receive $ 100K or above? [Visit 9] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]

variable.name: PDSB27F
variable.description: Q27f. You may not be able to give me an exact range for your family income. Did your family receive $ 10K or above? [Visit 9] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]

variable.name: PDSB27G
variable.description: Q27g. You may not be able to give me an exact range for your family income. Did your family receive $ 25K or above [Visit 9] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]

variable.name: PDSB28
variable.description: Q28. How much of that income do you contribute? Using this card tell me the letter that most closely matches your total income before taxes in (year) [Visit 9] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]

variable.name: PDSB29
variable.description: Q29. On average, how many people, including yourself does your total family income support? [Visit 9] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]

variable.name: PDSB30A
variable.description: Q30a. Including yourself, how many people lived in your house during the past 12 months? [Visit 9] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]

variable.name: PDSB30B
variable.description: Q30b. Including yourself, how many people lived in your house during the past 12 months? Of these, how many are under the age of 18? [Visit 9] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]

variable.name: PDSB31
variable.description: Q31. Now, think of a ladder with 10 steps representing where people stand in the United States. At step 10 are people who have the highest standing in their community. At step 1 are people who have the lowest standing in their community. [Visit 9] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]
